author: ESPNcricinfo staff
title: Pakistan's tour of Netherlands postponed indefinitely
description: The Covid-19 pandemic has claimed Netherlands' international home summer with all sports banned in the country until September 1 | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Pakistan's tour to the Netherlands has been postponed indefinitely due to the coronavirus pandemic. The decision was taken in light of the Dutch government's decision to ban all sports and cultural events in the country till September 1, with KNCB confirming … [+2451 chars]
